MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L26 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Lower Road and the surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still without power. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations being required and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:00AM 25th November 2020
